name: The Maze Game (WCrossGames)
description:
Welcome!  This is the Planet Cerritulus and you were on a mission until you were caught by the Triplicatas, the natives of Cerritulus.

Your mission -- COLLECT THE COINS AND ESCAPE!

Use the arrow keys to guide the ball and the space bar to jump.  Collect all of the coins on each level and a door will appear.  Touch the door to move on to the next level.

Designer Credit: Vishisht
